page.title: 11EMPLOYMENT
page.content:
{PEOPLE'S WORK.By John Bere.
A Century ago these were the sort of jobs in the village.There were: {two masons,two butchers, {two publicans,a tailor and a {dressmaker,a dairyman, {a baker, a wheelwright, {a clockmender,cattle dealer, {a carpenter,a grocer,a miller, {a cooper,a blacksmith, {a thatcher,an ironmonger, {a shoe-maker,a midwife, { a Parish Clerk and Constable { and an Inland Revenue Officer. Today these are the only jobs in the village: {one shop keeper, a {milkman, a woodman, an undertaker, {a paper-round,an odd-job man, a {builder,a coalman,}and at the school there are{three permanent teachers, a {secretary, a cook}and{a cleaner.
